hero.title: Hi, I'm Amet Marcelo Quispe Espichan
hero.subtitle: Systems and Computer Engineer and Web Developer.

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I’m Amet Marcelo Quispe Espichan, a Systems and Informatics Engineer. I’m passionate about modern web development and automation, especially in cloud environments like Azure and AWS. I have consistently stood out academically, ranking in the top third during both 4th and 5th years of high school, and in the early semesters of university.
about.recognitionText: I was awarded a certificate of commendation by the Commander General of the Peruvian Army, in recognition of my contribution to the development of a data management and troop identification system. This implementation delivered tangible operational benefits to the military institution.

projects.title: Portfolio
